async src.routes.contacts.Delete(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))¶

Parameters:

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user.

Returns:

Return type:

dict

  • user (User) – Current authenticated user.

  • limit (int) – Maximum number of contacts to retrieve.

  • user_id (int) – ID of the user.

  • db (AsyncSession) – The database session.

Returns:

Class for authentication-related functionalities.

async create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Create an access token for authentication.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – Data to be encoded into the token.

  • expires_delta (float, optional) – Expiry time for the token (in seconds).

Returns:

Encoded access token.

Return type:

str

pwd_context = <CryptContext>¶
verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)¶

Verify if the provided plain password matches the hashed password.

Parameters:

  • plain_password (str) – The plain password to be verified.

  • hashed_password (str) – The hashed password to be compared against.

Returns:

True if passwords match, else False.

Return type:

bool

REST API CONTACTS services Email¶

async src.services.email.send_email(email: EmailStr, username: str, host: str)¶

Send an email with a verification token for email confirmation.

Parameters:

  • email (EmailStr) – Email to send the confirmation to.

  • username (str) – Username of the recipient.

  • host (str) – Host URL where the verification link will point to.
